author: christopherbrumm
content:
The implemented solutions is up and running successfully. However, I have a questions about your approach: 

Will all blob transactions be type 3 txs? And vice versa, will type 3 txs only be blob transactions?

cc <@665236020312145930>

author: jgm
content: Yes, that's the definition of a type 3 transaction

author: christopherbrumm
content: Do rollups like Arbitrum and Optimism rely on the archival storage of historical blobs? If not, which other benefits could provide archival storage of all blobs sent to a certain sequencer?
